metadata.name: Doze
metadata.description:
Like an Echo.
Everything we do in our life reverberates towards infinity and immensity.

When we leave, our footprint remains somehow, transmutes.
But it is still part of this crazy Universe.

Every action, every gesture we make, every moment we are part of, builds who we are.
The enlargement of the Spirit does not rest.

We ultimately have to let go of so many things in life that the only thing left for us to do is trust.

Faith calls us to the surrender of the human, reminds us that more than a Body and more than a Soul, there is a Spirit that sustains us and that there are many things that from the body we cannot understand but always happen to us for something greater. 

It is life.
' I sail on the water and trust that my power of action is limited, although necessary. In that limitation, I take responsibility for each small gesture that makes up something greater of which it was a part '.

Only then will you reverberate in infinity in the purest way possible.

 ∞♡
